name: 243-13 sweet november
sizes_available: xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl
notes:
**knitted jumper in drops air and drops kid-silk. the piece is worked top down with raglan. sizes xs - xxl.**

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern ai-456
yarn group c + a

-------------------------------------------------------


**sizes**:
xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl

**yarn**:
drops air from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group c)
250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 01, off white
and use:
drops kid-silk from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
100-100-100-125-125-125 g colour 01, off white

**needles**:
drops circular needle size 6 mm: length 40 cm and 80 cm.
drops circular needle size 4.5 mm: length 40 cm and 80 cm.
drops double pointed needles size 6 mm.
drops double pointed needles size 4.5 mm.
the technique magic loop can be used â€“ you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size.

**knitting tension**:
14 stitches in width and 16 rows in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm.
note: needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
